description:
In Kyoto, in the final days of the Tokugawa Shogunate, a cruel destiny awaits Kunoichi...
The winds of revolution howl through Kyoto as the tokagawa era comes to a violent close. Will Kaede, Kikyoo, and Ayame follow the ninja code of honor and face their vicious destiny, or escape to another world? Will their love for each other and the men they destined to betray effect their fate? But now, a secret command makes them to risk their lives. Their passions will ignite as our story begins....
title: The Last Kunoichi
